# frame

**Instance Property**

The coordinate space is the bounds of the parent dragging item.

## Declaration

```swift
var frame: NSRect { get set }
```

## Discussion

The frame is {{0,0}, {`draggingFrame.size.width`, `draggingFrame.size.height`}}.

The coordinate space is the bounds of the parent [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingItem] instance’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingItem/draggingFrame].

## Related Documentation

- **draggingFrame**: The frame of the dragging item.

## Dragging Image Contents

- **contents**: An object providing the image contents of the component.
